title: "AI Search Art"
content:
Welcome to our website, where we bring together the best of art and technology. Our minimalist and modern design is inspired by the latest advancements in artificial intelligence and search engine technology. 

Our website is a hub for those who appreciate abstract illustrations and want to stay up-to-date with the latest AI-powered search engines. Our wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine is the perfect representation of what we stand for - the intersection of art and technology.

Join us on this journey as we explore the endless possibilities of AI and its impact on the world of art. Stay tuned for updates on the latest AI-powered search engines and their integration into the world of art.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine, with a minimalist and modern design, set against a gradient background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
